name: Hyria

skills.name: Feint

Attacks 1 enemy. Has an extra 25% chance of inflicting a critical hit.

skills.name: Poisonous Lily
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 35% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]

Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
